Ditto (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0131: Lapras
Pokémon
#0133: Eevee →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Ditto (TCG Pocket).

Ditto has been featured on 28 different cards since it debuted in the Fossil expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Ditto cards are normally Colorless-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Ditto

Ditto
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
